src: This is the source code file.
.gitignore: This file is used to ignore files and folders during git operations.
tsconfig.json: This file is used to configure the TypeScript compiler.
package.json: This file is used to configure the Node.js project.
dist: This folder is used to store compiled JavaScript files.
nodemon.json: This file is used to configure the nodemon process.
src/routes/index.ts: The main router, which directs traffic to different API versions
src/server.ts: The entry point of the application, which starts the server
src/app.ts: The main application file, which sets up middleware and routes
src/routes/v1/index.ts: The router for API v1, which combines all v1 routes.
src/controllers/auth.controller.ts: The controller that contains the `register,login,getMe` function, which handles the business logic for user registration
